name: My Friends Abandoned Me
description:
They left me, they literally left me before the jam even started. Actually I’ve been with nothing before the theme was revealed! My team mates couldn’t participate in the jam BeCaUsE oF rEaSoNs (but these were important, to be honest). Since I am graphic designer I had two options: give up or learn some game engine. I present to you THE RESULTS.

How to play?

Your goal is to escape the cellar. Exit is on tob of the empty room (so you strat with nothing, right?). Find more boxes to reach the ladder. Easy, right? Nope, there are bugs (literally and figuratively).

Controls ButtonActionLef arrow or AMove leftRight arrow or DMove rightUp arrow or WJump (you can also double jump)Spacebar or TabAttackE or ShiftPick/drop a box Music

By: TeknoAXE http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

Title: Synthwave E: http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1534

License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0
